question: Which archipelago did Tropical Cyclone Sarai recently hit?
explanation: The tropical cyclone Sarai had recently hit Fiji, a country in the South Pacific. It is an archipelago consisting of more than 300 islands. On its present track, the cyclone is forecasted to pass adjacent to Fijiâ€™s main island Viti Levu and then may head towards Tonga, where the tropical cyclone warning centre has been alerted.
